title: Tech Stuff
content: Writing about tech can be just as important as making it. Developers spend plenty of time creating new applications and debugging existing codebases, but most developers also spend at least some of their time reading.

title: More tech stuff
content: A simple Google search for any concept covered in this course returns thousands of think pieces and tutorials from developers of all skill levels!?

title: New technology
content: Your app will follow the MVC paradigm in its architectural structure, using Handlebars.js as the templating language, Sequelize as the ORM, and the express-session npm package for authentication.
